Module org.baxter.disco.ocr
Package org.baxter.disco.ocr

Class OpenCVFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.baxter.disco.ocr.OpenCVFacade
  • public class OpenCVFacade
extends Object
    Facade for the OpenCV package. Performs image capture, as well as image manipulation. Final product should only have one function publicly available; takeImages().
    Version:
    19 Jan. 2023
    Author:
    Blizzard Finnegan

      • gammaCalibrate

        public static boolean gammaCalibrate​(String cameraName)
        Modify a camera's Gamma value, based on config data.
        Parameters:
        cameraName - The name of the camera you would like to modify
        Returns:
        false if illegal camera name, otherwise true

      • gammaCalibrate

        public static boolean gammaCalibrate​(String cameraName,
                                     double gamma)
        Modify a camera's Gamma value, based on a given value.
        Parameters:
        cameraName - The name of the camera you would like to modify
        gamma - The new gamma value for the camera
        Returns:
        false if illegal camera name, otherwise true

      • gammaAdjust

        public static org.bytedeco.javacv.Frame gammaAdjust​(org.bytedeco.javacv.Frame image,
                                                    double gamma)
        Modify the gamma of a single image. !!This should only be done to assist in setting config values.!!
        Parameters:
        image - Image to have its gamma adjusted
        gamma - Gamma value to set
        Returns:
        Frame of the modified image

      • takePicture

        public static org.bytedeco.javacv.Frame takePicture​(String cameraName)
        Wrapper function for native "take picture" function. Image is immediately converted to greyscale to improve RAM footprint.
        Parameters:
        cameraName - Name of the camera to take a picture with.
        Returns:
        null if camera doesn't exist, or if capture fails; otherwise, Frame of the taken image

        Parameters:
        cameraName - Name of the camera to take a picture with.
        frameCount - The number of images to take.
        Returns:
        List of Frames taken from the camera. List is in order

                                             int x,
                                             int y,
                                             int width,
                                             int height)
        TODO: Implement Overloads Crop the given image to the given dimensions.
        Parameters:
        image - Frame taken from the camera.
        x - X-coordinate of the top-left of the cropped portion of the image.
        y - y-coordinate of the top-left of the cropped portion of the image.
        width - width of the the cropped portion of the image.
        height - height of the the cropped portion of the image.
        Returns:
        Frame of the cropped image

      • thresholdImage

        public static org.bytedeco.javacv.Frame thresholdImage​(org.bytedeco.javacv.Frame image)
        Put the given image through a binary threshold. This reduces the image from greyscale to only pure white and black pixels.
        Parameters:
        image - Frame taken from the camera.
        Returns:
        Frame of the thresholded image

      • saveImage

        public static File saveImage​(org.bytedeco.javacv.Frame image,
                             String fileLocation)
        Save input Frame at the location given.
        Parameters:
        image - Image to be saved.
        fileLocation - Where to save the image.
        Returns:
        File if save was successful, otherwise null

      • compose

        public static org.bytedeco.javacv.Frame compose​(List<org.bytedeco.javacv.Frame> images,
                                                boolean threshold,
                                                boolean gammaAdjust,
                                                double gamma,
                                                boolean crop,
                                                int x,
                                                int y,
                                                int width,
                                                int height)
        Compose several images together. This will also perform thresholding, gamma adjustment, and cropping, based on boolean toggles.
        Parameters:
        images - List of images to be composed
        threshold - Whether to put the image through a binary threshold
        gammaAdjust - Whether to adjust the image's gamma
        gamma - Gamma value to be set on the camera
        crop - Whether to crop the image
        x - X-coordinate of the top-left of the cropped portion of the image.
        y - y-coordinate of the top-left of the cropped portion of the image.
        width - width of the the cropped portion of the image.
        height - height of the the cropped portion of the image.
        Returns:
        A single image, found by boolean AND-ing together all parsed images.

      • completeProcess

        public static File completeProcess​(String cameraName,
                                   boolean crop,
                                   boolean threshold,
                                   boolean gammaAdjust,
                                   int compositeFrames,
                                   String saveLocation)
        Processes image from defined camera, using the config defaults. TODO: More robust file output checking
        Parameters:
        cameraName - Name of the camera to take a picture from.
        crop - Whether to crop the image
        threshold - Whether to threshold the image
        gammaAdjust - Whether to adjust the gamma of the image
        compositeFrames - Number of frames to composite together
        saveLocation - Name of the outgoing file
        Returns:
        null if any error occurs; otherwise File of output image

      • completeProcess

        public static File completeProcess​(String cameraName,
                                   String saveLocation)
        Processes image from defined camera, using the config defaults. Assumes you want to crop and threshold, but not gamma adjust the image. (Gamma should be set on the camera by modifying the config.)
        Parameters:
        cameraName - Name of the camera to take a picture from.
        saveLocation - Name of the outgoing file
        Returns:
        null if any error occurs; otherwise File of output image

      • iteration

        public static List<File> iteration()
        Collect images from all cameras and save them, using the config defaults.
        Returns:
        List of Files, as defined by #completeProcess(String, String)
